articles.author: Firstpost
articles.title: ‘Guns don’t shoot’: Trump unfazed in his love for firearms despite bids on life, Florida mass shooting
articles.description: Gun violence and gun rights have been passionate debates in American society. People have made documentaries, drafted bills, made it their election agenda and learnt to live with both. President Trump sees guns as a means to stop violence
articles.content:

articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: Jim Acosta takes shot at Trump supporters
articles.description: Acosta left CNN in January, less than two weeks after Trump took office.
articles.content:
Liberal ex-CNN anchor Jim Acosta took a shot at Donald Trump supporters in an interview published Friday, suggesting that half of the country was uninterested in the truth.

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: Trump is studying how to remove Fed Chair Jerome Powell, economic adviser says
articles.description: Trump administration economist Kevin Hassett said Powell's removal is being studied by the president and his team.
articles.content:
President Trump and his team are studying whether firing Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is an option, according to National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett.

articles.author: Snopes.com
articles.title: What we know about claims Trump admin wanted UK to remove LGBTQ+ protections before trade deal
articles.description: U.S. Vice President JD Vance chastised European leaders for lacking commitment to free speech during an address in Germany in February 2025.
articles.content:
A widespread claim that U.S. President Donald Trump would require the U.K. to get rid of laws protecting LGBTQ+ people before agreeing to a trade deal circulated on news outlets and social media in mid-April 2025.
